评论详情: Such a beautiful and comfortable dress, possibly the prettiest I've ever owned! This one does have more of a smell than the other pieces I ordered from this brand, but it is made with Rayon so that is expected due to the manufacturing processes and will dissipate with time.  The issue with this dress is the arm holes- they gap at the sides which gives the illusion of it being too large. In reality, this is just because the straps are too long, and I will be fixing it by shortening them- I took a picture holding them up to be shorter so you can kind of see how it helps to pull the excess fabric in under your arms.  It's a bit longer on me than the photos looked, so bear that in mind as I am not short- I'm 5'6, and the shortest point of the hem reaches just below the knee on me. However it is a good length on me and has lovely glow and movement so I don't mind!  This dress is really comfy and is made of a thin, soft T-shirt type material. It seems breathable enough for summer but not too thin for cooler months. It's very versatile and I can see myself dressing it up for evenings as well as wearing it casually as a daytime sundress!!

I love this dress. I usually am a size 16/18 and I’m 5’4”. I got this in a 1x/2x and it fits great! Make sure to wash before you wear because the dye will rub off. Also, be careful with the dress and make sure to hand wash because my dress tore at the bottom because I didn’t follow directions. Easy enough to fix though! I will definitely buy more from this store.
Love the dress. Very unique and cute- the shoulders were really large on my though (5’2”/ 180lbs) so I had to take it to a tailor.
beautiful but had to return fit was way too small

Lovely dress.  Photo doesn't reflect tge rich deep purple.  I am 5'3" 150 lbs.  I bought small/medium since larger size wasn't available so I was hoping it would fit..  it runs quite large, but the back tie and front corset type tie provide room for smaller or bigger busts and waists

Overall fits very well, comfortable fabric - the embroidery is nice and doesn’t have itchy backing like some… not see-through (I got the green)… lays over figure nicely - accentuate my curves with satisfaction without looking like I’m pregnant stripper ( I am not either lol). Tie straps aren’t too short or too long. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because: Bra straps don’t show on the shoulder (which is great) but it is a little too low cut on the back and shows bra back strap so I had to take it up a little - but it’s a really easy fix with some safety pins or a quick sew job so I don’t need a tailor to do it.

评论概述: Fit great, but was falling apart right out of the package.
评论详情: The dress fit fantastically, but unfortunately is very cheaply made. A lot of the embroidery was coming apart when I took it out of the package, and after a few hours gentle wear, seams were fraying and coming apart.
I got this dress for a costume and now I wear it on the regz
Runs extremely big.
Love this company,unfortunately every style fits differently. This one ran large so order smaller size, I usually order a 1x and was way too big.

Dress fits perfectly, but I had to alter around arm holes. I took about 2 inches out around each arm hole, so that it didn't sag. Absolutely beautiful! I had the same one years ago and got so many compliments.  This dress is my favorite dress I've ever owned.

This dress is so gorgeous and I was impressed with the fit. The 1x/2x fits more like a 2x, which was good because I usually fit a 2x or 3x and wasn't sure which to get. If you have a very large chest or a wide waist, consider sizing up. The back of the bodice is stretchy so there is some room for larger chests but the waist is not stretchy at all so if you're in an "apple shaped" body there may be some discomfort when you sit, bend, etc. The uneven hem is so pretty! The shortest part was about mid thigh on me, and parts of the fabric are sheer, so a taller person may find they need shorts or tights underneath for full coverage. The color is amazing and I love the shiny thread throughout the embroidery on the front. Very pleased that it's just metallic thread so I don't have to worry about tiny beads falling off. This dress is going to make it's debut as part of a fairy costume for an event, but I'm definitely going to wear it again and again!
Nice dress. Small is like a large.
Fit was perfect.  Everyone loves this dress

评论概述: I’m so bummed, but the sizing chart is inaccurate.
评论详情: Sizing chart is incorrect compared to the actual product.

Great dress. Looks better in person. This dress is designed with delicate fabrics and embroidery. The washing instructions state that this dress must be hand washed, it is not washer safe. If you put it in the washer don't be surprised when comes out in threads. I bought the navy blue.

评论概述: Finally the same quality as it looked online!!
评论详情: I’m very happy with the quality and color of this dress. It looks just as it does online and I have a very large frame so I was so happy it fit me perfectly. 200 lbs and 3 months pregnant and it has room for me to grow some more this summer.

评论概述: My dress ripped the day of my son's wedding

评论详情: I absolutely loved this dress! It was a little tight when I tied it in the back but still fit perfect. What I loved most about the dress is that it’s a thick material.
Doesn't allow for a woman's body to be hour glass shaped. If you are super thin you have it made but if you are well proportioned then it won't happen for you!
Buy a size smaller

This is a gorgeous dress! It's a little small, so you might want to order a size up. Beautiful materials and it is  made well enough for a few wearings. Not sure I would trust it for more than a few occasions, but great for at least the first one! I wore it to a weeding, it was great.

评论概述: Poorly made dress! Do not waste your money!!
评论详情: Love the style and fit is amazing... BUT the quality is horrible!!  I've worn this dress 3 times in the past 3 months and everytime there is a new hole or tear I have to mend!! I'm very careful when wearing it... only have hand washed and line dried, but still its falling apart. Literally disintegrating!!  Very sad since I love the style.

评论概述: The seams came apart after wearing once!
评论详情: I absolutely LOVE this dress. It flows beautifully. The fit was perfect...not tight anywhere, not loose anywhere. I got to wear it ONCE. By the end of the day, the material at the seams had frayed apart and separated! Imagine having to finish out the day with clients with my bra showing! Thank goodness I keep a cover-up in my office. So disappointed. And of course buy the time I could wear it, the return time was up.
Beautiful dress & comfortable

Don't buy this unless you know some way to prevent it from fading all over you.  First, I don't think it will wash well and would need lots of ironing.  I wore it without washing it.  I put it on, drove 2 hours to an event, and by the time I arrived, my hands were completely orange!  It did wash off, at least.  But I had to wash my hands multiple times.  Then, when I returned home, I took off my dance tights and low and behold, those had turned orange as well.  I'm lucky that my car seats didn't turn orange.
I was sad that it didn't even come close to fitting.
This dress fits true to size. And the length is perfect on me.
Just was t what I was expecting.

The color was never set in. Hand washed before wearing in cold water. Distroyed the grout by my kitchen sink. Hung to dry in the shower. Distroyed the grout in my shower. I then hand washed in cold water and white vinagar to set in the color. Wore it and it then distroyed my under garments. So a dress that cost around 40 something dollars then ended up costing me an extra $100 and a lot of my time. Plus had to bleach my hands and nails.  Very unhappy.
The fit all around was good...beautiful dress!

评论概述: Lovely dress that is flattering and beautiful
评论详情: True to size. Fit everywhere except a bit loose under the arms. Bought 2 colors. Will buy again! The designs are nice. Fabric is also forgiving.
Was a little loose under arms but fit perfectly else where.
It is very pretty embroidery but it had very large arm holes.
Love this dress! I ordered the small-medium glad I did they do run a bit big
It was a little to big. I think it should have been individual sizes . s/m/l/xl.  Wore to a country wedding reception!!!
Mefasino
This was sooooo big it was like a moomoo
Bought a large, normally wear xl but was going for tighter fut. Very big and baggy, especially under arms. Quality of material not too bad, just be extra careful washing it
I normally wear a XL. I am a 42D in the chest. A bit tight in the chest. But nice. Will wear it more often out to eat. Fun to throw on.

Super pretty! I love the color! It fits wonderfully, and is super flattering. I originally bought a purple dress from this company, and it was a one size fits all/most deal. This is be better for plus size people because they have a size option. Hope this helps! :)

This dress is really pretty and I’ve ordered several items from Sakkas.  I ordered the small/medium and under the arms it’s loose.  I’m 5’3”, 125 lbs, 36b so I was hoping the medium would be a better fit.

I ordered this along with another accidentally, thinking I was ordering the longer version of this dress. I thought “Well Ill wear bike shorts underneath and wear one of them before I wash the other. “ I got so many conplements that Im keeping both. The reason why I was thinking of not keeping them wasn’t because they didn’t fit me absolutely perfectly but because the sheer part hits me at panty line. So for me I have to wear a skirt underneath but I chose to wear bike shorts and it was absolutely perfect. The dress is totally comfortable and soft and I just love it ! I just want to mention that with her dresses it’s really important for me to read the notes rather than looking at the sizing chart because it will say “Max bust size” . Also, now I will pay better attention to the length if in the notes. I really appreciate the quick shipping too. 😊
The dress is not mid length as pictured, it is a mini skirt.

This dress worked out perfectly for the event I wore it too. It is very comfortable, the fabric is better then expected and the color was great! I ordered the s/m, it was a little big on me so I washed and dried it and that helped. Hopefully the dress will hold up for a long time as i can see getting a lot of use out of it.
Love the dress, and fabric.  However, it is very large and short.  Would return but don’t have the tags.

I think I ordered it too big. But the dress it’s beautiful. Was not able to return only because I did not have the time and needed to use it that week. That’s what happens when you make a last minute order. Otherwise it’s perfect!
Fits as expected love the color and looks!
Beautiful dress!
Even though it was a little large I love it! I was able to make adjustments.
It work just perfectly I got it for a special occasion and loved it
Very disappointed.  Way too big.  Had to alter it but still was too big.. Wont use it again, waste my money .

I LOVE THE DRESS. EVERYONE REALLY LIKED IT ON ME. I WORE IT TO A CARRIE UNDERWOOD CONCERT WITH MY BOOT.  THANKS

评论概述: Very pretty but a bit big
评论详情: It's a beautiful dress and i love it. I'm 5'8" and pretty slender. Since S/M is the smallest option I went for it. It ties at the waist so that part is OK, but it is a little baggie under the arms. If you look really close at the model you'll see what I'm talking about. Honestly i like it so much I will probably just alter it slightly. I have a small bust, also, so this doesn't help. The dress has some weight to it. Feels like good quality for the price and has nice flow. Just wish there was smaller size. A little wide on the shoulders, too.

评论概述: Very cute dress for the money
评论详情: Very nice material, color and very attractive for the price

I am a size 14-16, 5'6' and about 190 lbs.  Got the 1-2x.  An awesome fit with the exception of the top: I am going to do an old fashioned "dart"at the armpit to make it fit better.  That is the only reason I didn't give 5 stars.  I plan to enjoy not just for summer and now (early fall, still in 70's in VA!), this will be adorable to through a cardigan on and boots.  I have a pair of red boots that I am thinking of, they don't match reds too well, but will be great with this dress and a red sweater.  Can easily be a year round item.  Hoping that by hand washing item will hold up!
I purchased this Dress to wear at a Renaissance Festival. Fit was alittle loose but I prefer this. Wanted something Festive but not over the top.

评论概述: Beautiful dress fits just right, beautiful material with a lots of flow
评论详情: Love it all, country wedding
I love this dress is beautiful

The dress is very pretty, but the size ran a little large. The smallest available was S/M. I am a small lady and it was very loose. The armholes are very loose and a camisole is needed underneath. Overall, the dress is very well made and very nice looking. Wish it came smaller.
It was super flowy, very comfy, a smidge bigger than I expected for a Small/Medium - I'm a 34B, 5'8, 135 lbs - but with the tie in the back and maybe a tuck here or there it's a great dress
I like that it’s S/M and can change the fit based on how tight you tie the waist. Very comfortable and flattering

While the dress itself it pretty, it’s absolutely gigantic. I’ve gotten dresses similar to this in a S/M with no issue, but this dress is definitely a L/XL with the wrong label. Even tied back, there’s a ton of extra fabric. Looks good if a sweater is covering up all the extra.

评论概述: Perfect choice for Western themed Wedding to wear with cowboy boots!
评论详情: Very pretty details with stitching and lacing in front with shirring in back for a nice snug fit without being tight at all. The Rayon fabric was heavy enough to drape nicely and did not wrinkle in luggage, even when rolled up!  Well made. I ordered the teal color and it was a beautiful rich color.
It’s a beautiful dress and food quality. Very happy with this purchase.
Fits great. Looks great.  I have several colors
All was great

Such an adorable dress, I had to return it. I wear a size 6, sometimes an 8, this dress was way too big. At the very least it is a size Medium or Medium/Large and they don't offer a smaller size. Boo hoo.
Love this dress. Fits perfect and very well made.

评论概述: Beautiful but upper body too long
评论详情: I am 5'4" and the top was long and I had to get it altered.  This was for my Daughter's wedding.  The length was perfect with my boots and the color was spot on.  I did receive a lot of compliments on the detail!  One great thing, lol:  I get so hot so easy but this dress did not show one wet mark from me sweating like a beast :)
This dress is beautiful!  Fit is true to size. Excellent fabric, embroidery is fabulous!  Extremely well made, will order more! I ordered Copper in color, it's amazing!!
I needed a dress for a western themed party. This dress was perfect. It arrived quickly. The top of the dress around the straps were a little loose. The dress is a L/XL size.

Love it

The dress I received was very poorly made and ill-fitting.  One arm hole was bigger than the other, causing the front of the dress on that side to droop and hang away from my body.  The dye used on the fabric had a very strong, offensive odor and the fabric was stiff and scratchy.  This is the type of dress you'd buy for $10  from a roadside vendor in the Dominican Republic, and you'd regret your purchase.  Don't do it.

I ordered this dress as a reward for loosing 22 pounds, I was so excited that it fit so well. The color is a deeper red but absolutely gorgeous. If you don’t want attention don’t order this dress, the first time I wore it got got many compliments.

I bought this in Blue and one in Black. I have gained weight I'm 5'6 160 34DDD I got the L XL and it was too big which made me look larger . Sent it back for the S/M and it fits great.  Definitely runs big. I love the dress for the price super cute and fun

Well, I'm a L/XL and this fit perfectly. I've got a 44" bust, 36" waist, and 42" hips. I usually wear a 12 or 14 in pants and dresses, depending on the fabric.  The fabric feels like linen or a really light denim. I love this.
I love the handkerchief hem, laced bodice and rich color. It's quite tight in the chest area especially if you're busty. Aside from that, the dress is beautiful and perfect for Summer.
Looks just like the picture, fits great and I’m too heavy..
Beautiful dress but very poor quality. One time hand washing and the beads are falling off, strings loose from many different places.

Good dress, overall, and very pretty. I had to hand stitch to shorten the shoulders a little because they were gapping a bit (had it been a spaghetti strap it would have fallen off, since it was a wide strap it just looked a little funny), but that might just be a quirk of my particular anatomy, not the dress itself. My only complaint is there were a lot of loose threads I had to snip off this dress, more than I remember being on the Sakkas dress I bought in the past. I'm a little afraid to wash it, I'll definitely be hand washing it very carefully. I ordered the S/M, and it fit well other than the shoulder issue I mentioned. I fit in a size 6 - 10 dress usually (depending on brand) with a 34D chest. I'm 5'4" and the dress hit at about my knees.
Pretty dress. High priced in my opinion though.
Liked the dress

Such a pretty dress.  I think it feels very well made.  It has some weight to it.  Anyone who decides to order this,  know that it runs very large.  I got a medium, I'm 5'5 140. The medium is really big on me
the quality was low, color not right, I will give this dress to my housekeeper.

I love it and I know it will fit better in a couple months the size is pretty close to accurate

评论概述: Small in the chest, but otherwise beautiful.
评论详情: Beautiful color, I bought the purple. I got the 1x/2x because I have a wide rib cage, but my bust (which is not large like a small c) was squished. I would probably get one size up. Otherwise the dress is very flattering. It does have a strong chemical smell when you take it out of the package, probably from the dye. It was better after airing it out overnight. Haven’t washed it yet, so I’m a little worried it will run.

I ordered the Golden color in medium ( i’m mostly large size, but m/l fits great)  and it is beyond beautiful! .. better than the picture I would say. The way the dress was cut helps to give a nice shape for any body type, it can be perfect for a fall day with booties or for a summer day too, since it has this bohemian romantic touch. I’m planning to wear it for a graduation ceremony wearing jewelry and high heels  , which will work perfectly too because the dress can be a little formal too. Love the embroidered and the lace pieces on the sides.  It’s very well done. I highly recommed  this dress.
I love this dress perfect fit!

I purchased this dress for a Renaissance Faire costume. I love the color and though I’ve had issues with this company in the past, They are the most affordable for dresses of this type. In the past I washed the dresses in my laundry machine with entire loads of laundry. They bled, a lot. And I ended up with pink laundry for my mistake.. more than once. But this is my fault. It says hand wash. Now this particular dress hasn’t been washed yet. At all. And my hands are blue from handling it. I’m frustrated because I didn’t plan to wash it before I wear it, as I’d hoped it would help retain its vibrancy. In the past once washed, the dresses became dull. And I was hoping to avoid that this time. The purple one I ordered came damaged. As many have said, different parts of the stitching and designs had come unraveled. Even before it was opened! I did get a refund for that one though. The dresses are beautiful. And if you are handy and can fix minor damages, they are a steal. Just know, the quality is low, and you get what you pay for.
This dress is beautiful!! Better than I had hoped!!
